languages.text: Паскаль — {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g}, как и Идира, но он также принадлежит к братству техножрецов, что дает ему дополнительные возможности, преимущества и уникальные навыки. Паскаль имеет мехадендрит, который позволяет ему одновременно держать в руках двуручный топор техножреца и дополнительное дистанционное оружие — экипируйте его в мехадендрит через окно инвентаря в сервисном меню {console_bind|RightBottom}. Связь с машинным духом — особая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Паскаля, снижающая {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдачу{/g} и повышающая {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} оружия всех союзников в области. Все враги в этой же области получат противоположные {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g}. Изгнание машинного духа — особая способность Паскаля, которая на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} снижает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый атаками выбранной цели. Цели со свойством Отбрось плоть получают {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрический урон{/g}. Если цель — механизм или машина, эти повреждения удваиваются, а ее {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} понижаются до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Паскаль — адепт, как и Идира, но он также принадлежит к братству техножрецов, что даёт ему дополнительные возможности, преимущества и уникальные навыки. Паскаль имеет мехадендрит, который позволяет ему одновременно держать в руках двуручный топор техножреца и дополнительное дальнобойное оружие — экипируйте его в механодендрит через окно инвентаря в сервисном меню {console_bind|RightBottom}. Связь с машинным духом — особая способность Паскаля, снижающая отдачу и повышающая снижение уклонения оружия всех союзников в области. Все враги в этой же области получат противоположные эффекты. Изгнание машинного духа — особая способность Паскаля, которая на 1 раунд снижает урон, наносимый атаками выбранной цели. Цели со свойством Отбрось плоть получают электрический урон. Если цель — механизм или машина, эти повреждения удваиваются, а ее характеристики понижаются до конца боя.

languages.text: Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Паскаль — {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g}, как и Идира, но он также принадлежит к братству техножрецов, что дает ему дополнительные возможности, преимущества и уникальные навыки. Паскаль имеет мехадендрит, который позволяет ему одновременно держать в руках двуручный топор техножреца и дополнительное дистанционное оружие — экипируйте его в механодендрит через окно инвентаря в сервисном меню {console_bind|RightBottom}. Связь с машинным духом — особая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Паскаля, снижающая {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдачу{/g} и повышающая {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} оружия всех союзников в области. Все враги в этой же области получат противоположные {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g}. Изгнание машинного духа — особая способность Паскаля, которая на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} снижает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый атаками выбранной цели. Цели со свойством Отбрось плоть получают {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрический урон{/g}. Если цель — механизм или машина, эти повреждения удваиваются, а ее {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} понижаются до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal is an Adept like Idira, but he is also a member of the fellowship of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a ranged weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communication is Pasqal's special ability which reduces the recoil and boosts the dodge reduction of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is Pasqal's special ability which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 round. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer shock damage. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

Pasqal is an Adept like Idira, but he is also a member of the fellowship of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a ranged weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communication is Pasqal's special ability which reduces the recoil and boosts the dodge reduction of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 round. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer shock damage. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

languages.text: Pasqal es un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} como Idira, pero también forma parte de la hermandad de los tecnosacerdotes. Gracias a ella, disfruta de más opciones, ventajas y cualidades únicas.{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g} Una de las mecadendritasde Pasqal le permite blandir al mismo tiempo su hacha de tecnosacerdote a dos manos y un arma {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. Equipa una segunda arma en su ranura de mecadendrita en la pantalla de inventario, que se puede abrir desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}. Comunión con espíritu máquina es la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} especial de Pasqal. Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} y potencia la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} de todas las armas de los aliados en un área. Todos los enemigos que estén en la misma área sufrirán {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} contrarios. Destierro de espíritu máquina es una de las capacidades especiales de Pasqal. Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que causan los ataques del objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Los objetivos con la característica Rechazo cárnico sufren {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g}. Si el objetivo es un mecanismo o una máquina, se duplica el daño y se reducen sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal es un adepto como Idira, pero también forma parte de la hermandad de los tecnosacerdotes. Gracias a ella, disfruta de más opciones, ventajas y cualidades únicas.{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g} Una de las mecadendritasde Pasqal le permite blandir al mismo tiempo su hacha de tecnosacerdote a dos manos y un arma {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. Equipa una segunda arma en su ranura de mecadendrita en la pantalla de inventario, que se puede abrir desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}. Comunicación con espíritu máquina es la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} especial de Pasqal. Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} y potencia la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} de todas las armas de los aliados en un área. Todos los enemigos que estén en la misma área sufrirán efectos contrarios. Destierro de espíritu máquina es una de las capacidades especiales de Pasqal. Reduce el daño que causan los ataques del objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}. Los objetivos con la característica Rechazo cárnico sufren {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g}. Si el objetivo es un mecanismo o una máquina, se duplica el daño y se reducen sus características hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: パスカルはイディラと同じ{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}だが、技術司祭に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}しているメンバーでもあるため、追加のオプション、アドバンテージ、独自の能力を得る。 パスカルの機械触手のひとつにより、彼は技術司祭の両手斧と{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンを同時に持つことができる。クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から移動できるインベントリ画面の機械触手スロットにふたつ目の武器を装備しよう。 機械精霊グループはパスカルの特殊な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で、{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}を軽減させ、エリア内にいる味方の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を強化させる。同じエリアにいる敵はすべて逆の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。 機械精霊バニッシュはパスカルの特殊アビリティのひとつで、ターゲットの攻撃によって与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間軽減する。肉体拒絶の特徴を持つターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を受ける。ターゲットがメカニズムや機械の場合、戦闘終了までこのダメージは2倍になり、その{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}は低下する。
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: パスカルはイディラと同じアデプトだが、技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}仲間{/g}のメンバーでもあるため、追加のオプション、アドバンテージ、独自の能力を得る。 パスカルの機械触手のひとつにより、彼は技術司祭の両手斧と{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を同時に持つことができる。クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から移動できるインベントリ画面の機械触手スロットにふたつ目の武器を装備する。 機械精霊はパスカルの特殊な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で、{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}を軽減させ、エリア内にいる味方の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を強化させる。同じエリアにいる敵はすべて逆の効果を受ける。 機械精霊追放はパスカルの特殊アビリティのひとつで、ターゲットの攻撃によって与えられるダメージを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間軽減する。肉体拒絶の特徴を持つターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を受ける。ターゲットがメカニズムや機械の場合、戦闘終了までこのダメージは2倍になり、その特性は低下する。

languages.text: 帕斯卡与和伊迪拉都是{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g}，但除此之外，帕斯卡还是一位技术神甫。正因如此，他拥有更多选择、优势与独一无二的能力。 帕斯卡的其中一条机械触须可以让他同时手持技术神甫的双手能量斧与一把{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器。您可以按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，查看物品栏界面中，将第二把武器装备到他的机械触须栏位。 机魂交流是帕斯卡的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可以减少区域内所有盟友武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}，提高武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}。同一区域内的所有敌人都会受到相反{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。 机魂放逐是帕斯卡的特殊能力，可降低目标所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标具有拒绝实肉特性，此能力还会造成{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}。如果目标是机械装置或机器，此能力会造成双倍伤害，还会降低目标所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡与和伊迪拉都是技师，但除此之外，帕斯卡还是一位技术祭司。正因如此，他拥有更多选择、优势与独一无二的能力。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g} 帕斯卡的其中一条机械触须可以让他同时手持技术祭司的双手能量斧与一把{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器。您可以按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，查看物品栏界面中，将第二把武器装备到他的机械触须栏位。 机魂交流是帕斯卡的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可以减少区域内所有盟友武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}，提高武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}。同一区域内的所有敌人都会受到相反效果影响。 机魂放逐是帕斯卡的特殊能力，可降低目标所有攻击造成的伤害，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标具有拒绝实肉特性，此能力还会造成{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}。如果目标是机械装置或机器，此能力会造成双倍伤害，还会降低目标所有属性，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Pasqal ist ein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} wie Idira, aber er ist auch ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} der Techpriester, was ihm zusätzliche Optionen, Vorteile und einzigartige Fähigkeiten verleiht. Einer von Pasqals Mechadendriten erlaubt es ihm, seine zweihändige Techpriester-Axt und eine {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Waffe gleichzeitig zu führen. Rüste eine zweite Waffe in seinem Mechadendrit-Slot im Inventarbildschirm aus, auf den du über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} zugreifen kannst. Maschinengeist-Kommunion ist Pasqals Spezial-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} reduziert und die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} der Waffen von Verbündeten in einem Gebiet erhöht. Alle Feinde im selben Gebiet werden mit entgegengesetzten {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekten{/g} belegt. Maschinengeist-Verbannung ist eine von Pasqals Spezialfähigkeiten, die den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} der Angriffe des Ziels für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} reduziert. Ziele mit der Eigenschaft Ablehnung des Fleisches erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g}. Wenn das Ziel ein Mechanismus oder eine Maschine ist, wird dieser Schaden verdoppelt und die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Ziels werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduziert.
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal ist ein Adept wie Idira, aber er ist auch ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} der Techpriester, was ihm zusätzliche Optionen, Vorteile und einzigartige Fähigkeiten verleiht. Einer von Pasqals Mechadendriten erlaubt es ihm, seine zweihändige Techpriester-Axt und eine {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} gleichzeitig zu führen. Rüste eine zweite Waffe in seinem Mechadendrit-Slot im Inventarbildschirm aus, auf den du über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} zugreifen kannst. Maschinengeist-Kommunikation ist Pasqals besondere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} reduziert und die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} der Waffen von Verbündeten in einem Gebiet erhöht. Alle Gegner im selben Gebiet werden mit entgegengesetzten Effekten belegt. Maschinengeist-Bannung ist eine von Pasqals Spezialfähigkeiten, die den Schaden der Angriffe des Ziels für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} reduziert. Ziele mit der Eigenschaft Fleisch ablehnen erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g}. Wenn das Ziel ein Mechanismus oder eine Maschine ist, wird dieser Schaden verdoppelt und die Eigenschaften des Ziels werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduziert.

languages.text: À l'instar d'Idira, Pasqal est un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g}, mais il est aussi membre de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}communauté{/g} des technoprêtres, ce qui lui confère des options supplémentaires, des avantages et des capacités uniques. L'un des mécadendrites de Pasqal lui permet de tenir simultanément sa hache de technoprêtre à deux mains et une arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Vous pouvez le doter d'une deuxième arme dans son emplacement de mécadendrite sur l'écran d'inventaire, disponible via l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}. Pasqal est doté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} spéciale Communication avec l'esprit de la machine, qui réduit le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} et améliore la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} des armes des alliés dans une zone donnée. Tous les ennemis situés dans la même zone subissent les {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} inverses. Pasqal est également doté de la capacité spéciale Bannissement de l'esprit de la machine, qui réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par les attaques de la cible pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Les cibles dotées de la caractéristique Rejet de la chair subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g}. Si la cible est un mécanisme ou une machine, ces dégâts sont doublés et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} sont réduites jusqu'à la fin du combat.

One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen, which can be navigated to from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are reduced until the end of combat.

Vous pouvez le doter d’une deuxième arme dans son emplacement de mécadendrite sur l'écran d'inventaire, disponible à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}. Pasqal est doté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} spéciale Communication avec l’Esprit des Machines, qui réduit le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} et améliore la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d’esquive{/g} des armes des alliés dans une zone donnée. Si la cible est un mécanisme ou une machine, ces dégâts sont doublés et ses caractéristiques sont réduites jusqu'à la fin du combat.
